title: Holes in Space - a poetry collection
description: 2015 Award Winning Silver Medal in Poetry from Readers Favorite Holes in Space is a collection of poems by author Andrea Barbosa. Love, passion, lust, heartbreak, desolation, loneliness, celebration: these are some of the themes captured in this poetry collection; reflections of time, tiny holes in an endless open space, intriguing possibilities, where anything can be accomplished with the power of words.
author: Andrea Barbosa
